title: 中世纪MOD 1.6.6 for Beta1.8【附PDF全中文详解文档】
author: fortomxq
txt_content:
本帖最后由 fortomxq 于 2011-10-3 08:21 编辑 

感谢kk1122cs分享0.7.4 115下载地址！感谢+倒霉の忍者+分享该Mod专用的高清材质！感谢akal1989提供懒人整合包！感谢woody1224分享简明介绍！


介绍

       中世纪是一个尚在开发阶段的新MOD，它的作用是在Minecraft世界里产生一些11世纪法国风格的村庄，从而让游戏世界更为丰富。在新生成的地图上偶尔会出现这些村庄，里面有各种职业的村民。你可以同他们交易，帮助他们建设村庄，并从中获得木材，面包和苹果酒等好处。这个MOD有点像MineColony和Builders的混合体。该MOD和官方wiki由法国人Kinniken开发和维护。

简明的介绍 1.7.7 for 1.6.6 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5705-1-1.html （感谢woody1224分享）



安装方法
1、首先安装ModLoader，该MOD可以在各大论坛显眼的位置找到，这里不再敖述；
2、然后下载中世纪MOD，打开压缩文件，将Put in minecraft folder内的millenaire文件夹放到游戏根目录；
3、将Put in mods folder内的millenaire0.8.3c.zip文件直接放到游戏根目录下的mods文件夹内。
4、安装完成！




该MOD由HAYO翻译小组制作，转载请注明出处。

replies.author: aizuo
replies.txt_content:
Updates

0.7 - 31/05/11
- Markets: new building that can host one or more foreign merchants.
* Foreign merchants appear at random at night in the market
* A market can host up to three merchants at the same time after upgrades
* Merchants can sell goods to the player (same interface as for trade with the villagers)
* Merchants leave once their stock is over or they have spent three nights in the village
* Six types of merchants with different goods currently available: weapon merchants (sell iron and diamond weapons and armour), plant merchants (sell various plants, saplings and seeds), textile merchants (sell wool of all colours), art merchants (sell paintings and dyes), oriental merchants (sell sanstone, lapis lazulis, gold, diamonds and cactus) and viking merchants (sell amulets)
- Proper handling of metadata/damage values in the NPCs' and villages' inventories. This means that:
* Lumbermen now plant saplings of the type they collect
* Sheep farmers collect and sell wool of all natural colours, not just white
* Tapestries now require two white wool and one each of light gray, gray, brown and black wool
* All wool colours are now supported in buildings
- New amulet: "Amulette d'Yggrasil : Amulet of Yggrasil. Engraved with Yggrasil, the World Tree of Norse mythology whose roots reach the bottom of the world and whose branches touch the tip of the sky, this amulet will ensure you always know how high or deep you are."
- Priests no longer make amulets. They must be bought from Viking merchants instead.
- Increased the size of the trade screen
- Likely fix for the "villager clone" bug
- Many minor fixes


作者好像憋了很久……

replies.author: aizuo
replies.txt_content:
作者很勤快搬运工也很勤快……这是各个大型mod中更新最快的了吧，新东西也很多，正在发展期，作者野心不小啊
唯一的遗憾就是现在能下载到的自定义建筑不多……

话说0.78有了论坛坛友友情提供的寻路引擎和蓝图格式转换器（米国论坛真卧虎藏龙……），不知道会不会改善原版时不时就卡一下的情况？

而且现在终于有门了……不容易啊……

我有个预感，新的寻路引擎完善，再推几个关于门的bug fix之后，就该迎来临时稳定版0.8了……

replies.author: aizuo
replies.txt_content:
0.8b - 13/06/11
- Fixed major bug in 0.8 that caused problems in agricultural and artisanal villages from earlier versions

0.8 - 13/06/11
- Reputation: you now start as a stranger in villages you meet. Trade with the villagers to improve your reputation until they consider you as one of them. Hitting the villagers will however drop it fast.
- Village heads: every village now has a leader. In military and gros bourg, it is the knight, in ecclesiastic villagers or hamlets it's the monk, in agricultural ones the seneschal, and in artisanal ones the guild master. Right-click on a village head to see your standing in the village.
- Manors and Guild Houses: those new buildings are based on and replace respectively the agricultural town halls and the artisanal town halls. They are inhabited by the respectively the seneschal and the guild master. The Town Halls are no longer used in Millénaire, though they stay in the files for backward compatibility.
- Houses and land plots for the player: as your reputation rise, you can now purchase either houses or vacant land plots from the village, to be built by the villagers. Land plots come in three sizes, and there are three house type available: small houses, bourgeois houses and city estates
- Fixes to the new binary pathing engine
- Various fixes to buildings, especially the fort, by Ghost1972
- Fixed bug where knights and guards would not hold Norman swords even if they were equipped with them
- Fixed bug in the display of villagers' locations on the village map

replies.author: fortomxq
replies.txt_content:
rubbishkazi 发表于 2011-7-6 12:13 
我是最近留意到這個有趣的MOD的
minecraft已經1.7幾了....
但是我跟那些方法做了好幾次..可是都黑屏了orz ...

如果不行可能就没有办法了，只能等待作者更新……

replies.txt_content: 根目录……是指哪里？ 另外mods文件夹在哪里？

replies.author: fortomxq
replies.txt_content:
抱着绵羊的猫 发表于 2011-8-12 16:23 
根目录……是指哪里？ 另外mods文件夹在哪里？
根目录是指游戏安装的那个目录，而Mods文件夹一般由Modloader创建。如果没有，你可以自行创建。
